message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product which I believe would be very valuable for you. I'm thinking of a price around $14,000. What do you think?
Hi Alice,  $14,000 is a bit higher than I was hoping for.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,500 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $12,250?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $12,250 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  If that works for you, we can finalize the deal.
